snippet.title: Akko de Pon! Ikasama Hourouki (DS) ~Part 1: Akiko, Summers, and Sayaka~
snippet.description:
The super-late first part in my stream of the game about cheating, Akko de Pon, covering the first and second Tonpuusen. Recorded Friday, February 7th. This was recorded live on http://twitch.tv/sonickrazy with a live chat, so I will be addressing the chat at certain points. If you want to interact with me, join me fridays at 20:00 GMT!

If you're wondering what series this is based on, surprise! It's not based on anything, it's its own game. It's kind of like Tetsuya, only with Japanese celebrities. I explain everything else in the video.
